links.to_node: I arrive at work on time and my boss is pleased with my punctuality.
The person who crashed may have sustained injuries and may not receive immediate help.
I may feel guilty or conflicted about not stopping to help the person in need.
My decision not to stop may affect my perception of myself and my values.
The person who crashed may feel abandoned or neglected by my lack of assistance.
